name: GPR Partners
overview:
Since 1982, the partners of GRP have invested in some of the leading global brands:

* Costco
* Starbucks
* P.F. Chang&#8217;s
* Overture Services (acquired by Yahoo!)
* lastminute.com (acquired by Travelocity)
* DealerTrack (NASDAQ: TRAK)
* Bill Me Later (acquired by eBay)

We formed GRP Partners in 1996, and now manage approximately $1 billion on behalf of more than 150 limited partners in North America and Europe.

With professionals in Los Angeles and London, we have a global perspective when serving our portfolio companies and seeking investment opportunities.

We focus our investing in four areas:

* Digital Content & Distribution
* Online Business Services
* Financial Services & Technology
* Consumer

We prefer to invest in companies where technology plays a key role in the delivery of the product or service.

We invest in highly talented entrepreneurs with demonstrated drive, leadership and experience. We look for companies targeting large, high growth markets with products or services.

We prefer to invest in companies where:

* technology development is largely completed;
* demand can be validated from existing sales to highly satisfied customers;
* a primary marketing/distribution channel has been established; and
* our experience and relationships can bring value to the business.

We make investments in North America and Europe, although will consider opportunities on other continents.

Our preferred investment size is typically $1-$10 million.
